title: RIOT and MARVEL [VIDEO UFFICALE]

embed.description: We're partnering with Marvel Comics to work on multiple new series set in the world Runeterra. The first issue of Ashe: Warmother releases December 19, 2018 on Universe and ComiXology.

body:
è uscito il video che parla esattamente della collaborazione Riot-Marvel
